languages.text: This grenade blinds all enemies within the area for 2 turns if they fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. Enemies which succeed upon that Toughness test become {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} for 2 turns.
languages.original_text: Все цели в области действия совершают {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на сопротивление. В случае провала они оказываются ослеплены на 2 хода, а в случае успеха получают {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}тревожность{/g} на 2 хода.

traits.locale_text: All targets within the area make Toughness resistance check, if fail they become Blinded for 2 rounds.

All targets within the area make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance check, if they fail, they become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

All targets within the area make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance check, if they fail, they become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

This grenade blinds all enemies within the area for 2 turns if they fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. Enemies which succeed upon that Toughness test become {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} for 2 turns.

languages.text: 目标区域内所有目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，未能通过检定的目标会被致盲2回合。通过检定的目标会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}惊扰{/g}状态，持续2回合。
languages.original_text: This grenade blinds all enemies within the area for 2 turns if they fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. Enemies which succeed upon that Toughness test become {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} for 2 turns.

traits.locale_text: 目标区域内所有目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性检测，未能通过检定的目标会被{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: Esta granada ciega a todos los enemigos del área durante 2 turnos si fallan una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}. Si tienen éxito, quedan {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}perturbados{/g} durante 2 turnos.
languages.original_text: This grenade blinds all enemies within the area for 2 turns if they fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. Enemies which succeed upon that Toughness test become {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} for 2 turns.

traits.locale_text: Todos los objetivos del área hacen una prueba de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}. Si fallan, quedan {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegados{/g} durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}.

languages.text: このグレネードは、範囲内の全ての敵が対象で、相手が{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に失敗した場合、2ターンの間、盲目状態にする。耐久力判定に成功した敵は、2ターンの間、{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}動揺{/g}状態になる。
languages.original_text: This grenade blinds all enemies within the area for 2 turns if they fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. Enemies which succeed upon that Toughness test become {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} for 2 turns.

traits.locale_text: 範囲内の全ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}タフネス{/g}抵抗判定を行ない、失敗した場合、2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}状態となる。

languages.text: Все цели в области действия совершают {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на сопротивление. В случае провала они оказываются ослеплены на 2 хода, а в случае успеха получают {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}тревожность{/g} на 2 хода.
languages.original_text: All targets within the area make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance check, if they fail, they become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Все цели в области действия совершают проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на сопротивление. В случае провала они оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослеплены{/g} на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.

Все цели в области действия совершают проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на сопротивление. В случае провала они оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослеплены{/g} на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.

languages.text: Diese Granate blendet alle Feinde im Wirkungsbereich 2 Züge lang, wenn sie eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} nicht bestehen. Feinde, die Probe bestehen, sind 2 Runden lang {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}verstört{/g}.
languages.original_text: This grenade blinds all enemies within the area for 2 turns if they fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. Enemies which succeed upon that Toughness test become {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} for 2 turns.

traits.locale_text: Alle Ziele im Bereich machen die Probe auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-Widerstand. Scheitern sie, werden sie {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}geblendet{/g} für 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g}.

languages.text: Cette grenade aveugle tous les ennemis présents dans la zone pendant 2 tours s'ils échouent à un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}. Les ennemis qui réussissent ce test subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Perturbation{/g} pendant 2 tours.
languages.original_text: This grenade blinds all enemies within the area for 2 turns if they fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. Enemies which succeed upon that Toughness test become {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} for 2 turns.

traits.locale_text: Toutes les cibles de la zone passent un test lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g}. En cas d'échec, elles subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g} pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

languages.text: Bu bomba, alanda bulunan ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testinden{/g} geçemeyen tüm düşmanları 2 turluğuna kör eder. Bu Dayanıklılık testinden başarıyla çıkan düşmanlarda 2 turluğuna {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}kaygı{/g} etkisi oluşur.
languages.original_text: This grenade blinds all enemies within the area for 2 turns if they fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. Enemies which succeed upon that Toughness test become {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} for 2 turns.
